abstract: Driven column review of Ferrari 488 GTB.
lead_paragraph: The successor to the 458 is sculpture, status symbol and thrill ride in one seductive aluminum package.
snippet: The successor to the 458 is sculpture, status symbol and thrill ride in one seductive aluminum package....

headline.main: Video Review: The Ferrari 488 GTB Is an Operatic Thrill
headline.print_headline: For the Red Carpet, or the Racetrack
